name: MortgageQuote
0:
”"Alexa, open Mortgage Quote."”
”"Alexa, ask Mortgage Quote what is the payment for a 300,000 loan?"”
”"Alexa, ask Mortgage Quote what is the payment for a 30 year fixed rate mortgage."”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mortgage quote
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can use Mortgage Quote to calculate the monthly payment for a home loan.

Just say the loan amount, interest rate and mortgage term and Alexa will calculate the exact principal and interest mortgage payment for your scenario. 

To start just say, "Alexa, open Mortgage Quote."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
